pages.text: $(italic)The shooting stars you picked up left a fantastic shower of particles on their way to the ground.$(br)You created the Particle Spawner to replicate this spectacle yourself. Using pigment, you can also create a whole range of particle effects.$(br2)A chimney? Rocket launching particles? Atmospheric particle rain for your Pedestal structure? No problem.
The the particle spawners GUI you are able to configure the spawned particles to your liking.
